title: DarkStar Alliance

embed.description: For Australia and NZ MWO, Star Citizen and other gaming, come visit the Darkstar Alliance

body:
Just looking to get our clan out there in the league community

**DarkStar Alliance** is a Aus/NZ casual gaming guild with teamspeak and forums.
_Whilst our league focus is OCE, our player base is world wide_

We have a mature and relaxed atmosphere. Our members play a broad range of games.
_DSA was founded back in 1999 so we're well established and we're here to stay._

>We host both competitive and silly events **[FRIDAY NIGHTS](http://www.darkstar-alliance.com/home)** every week at 7pm, such as 1v1 and 2v2 knockout tournaments, internal 5s, and _Custom Game Modes_ (eg. Ultimate Bravery), and have regular **PRIZES and GIVEAWAYS** for our participating members.
>
>If you're looking for more serious play, we host scheduled _**DSA Ranked 5s Team nights every week**_ as well as impromptu ranked 5s games at any time. The team roster is open to substitutions every fortnight, so if you're keen to be on the team, come along to events and show us what you're made of!

**If you would like to join**
1. visit our website and register via the recruitment tab - http://darkstar-alliance.com/recruitment.
2. if you haven't already, download teamspeak - https://www.teamspeak.com/downloads.
3. bookmark DSA in teamspeak, _there is a link on the right hand side, mid way down on the DSA home page._
4. get your permissions setup on teamspeak by jumping on and introducing yourself or posting on the forums.

**If you would like to visit before deciding to sign up**
1. just jump on teamspeak, _link on DSA home page_

Visitors are always welcome to come along and kick some butt. 
No matter what you're into, casual or hardcore, come check us out!

replies.body: Hey all, recently joined this clan. I can say for the week or so I've been with these guys they are VERY active at night and  have a joke and play some games most of the evening. They are all nice, there are a lot of different senses of humor and personalities hanging around in TS so it's hard to not find one person you can get along with. These guys are all welcoming and just there to have a good time. I myself wanted to find some people to duo with and have fun, looking in the forums i stumbled across this and I highly recommend giving them a go. {{summoner:31}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Alrighty. It's been a while since we've run active events for DSA LoL, and if you ask me, I think we're overdue. One broken computer down, 6 months later with many combined frankenstein computer parts, and we're back online! {{champion:83}} 

> In the coming weeks we'll be congratulating our winners of DSA Fridays Season 1, and smashing out some more casual nights each week, as well as internals, dynamic ranked, and mini-tourneys. On top of that, the start of DSA Season 2 is just around the corner.
> 
> **This week, lets kick it off with a mix: Battle Royale, Baron/Spider Rush, and Yordle-topia! We'll be meeting up @ 7pm Sydney time.**

If you've never hung out with us before, feel free to jump on anytime and say hello, and we'll get some games in. :D

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2013/08/underwear-dance.gif
About time lol. I'll be there in my comfy hoody of extra agility.

Jump on Teamspeak punch ass! (you heard me)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

**Friday night EVENTS NIGHT** @ 7pm Sydney time - This week: _Protect the Queen mode!_

Join us on teamspeak for some laughs/screams.

Great times on Protect the Queen mode, I'm pretty sure the everyone reported the Soraka bots. :P
Especially thanks to those who generously rotated out so we could rotate others in and get everyone in at least a few games for the night.

MVP for the night was Cat O Nine Fails with 3 wins, 1 Losses, +34 score. Noice.

Also, welcome to DSA for AceSlayer, Hezekiller, and all the new folks joining for games like Mechwarrior Online, Total War Arena, Star Citizen and Elite Dangerous. Good to have everyone aboard. {{summoner:17}}

Over the last few weeks since I originally posted this thread, we've had great success. 
A very big welcome to the dozen new DSA Members!

Everyone's getting along really well. There's been plenty of laughs an a tone of great games. 
Our new members are really enjoying our relaxed and casual atmosphere. 

Our Friday and Saturday Night events are going great. The internal matches have been great fun. 
Big thanks to Teacup who's organised and run the events nights. Everything's running really smoothly.


If your tired of solo que pug drops and want to play league in a team environment...

DSA's doors are always open.

**What's on at DarkStar Alliance**

I'd like to extend a warm invitation to all players to join the fun at DSA this weekend and into the future. As you can see we have a variety of events scheduled for the weekends.

**Weekly Events - Scheduled**

_Friday 4/12/2015_
**Brothers in arms:**
5 sets of 2 partners - your partner is on the other team (evil twins). Work as a duo to kill others and protect each other. Points = 2/kill, 1/assist, -3/death (so its better to kill your evil twin if hes going to die anyway). Time limit, most points at end wins. Crystal Scar.

_Saturday 5/12/2015_
**5 Mans**
DSA Ranked 5's, eligibility is based on events attendance.

**Weekly Events - Un-Scheduled**

_Friday & Saturday_
We have a number of events pre-planed to pick from on the night for example:
2v2's, 3v3's & 5v5's featuring a variety of team compositions, some serious and some just plain outrageous.
